entities.name: wizards
entities.description: A crowd of wizards was marching slowly across the field.

entities.name: figures
entities.description: Four struggling figures were being contorted into grotesque shapes.

entities.name: tents
entities.description: Tents crumpled and fell as the wizards marched by.

relationships.description: It was as though the masked wizards on the ground were puppeteers, and the people above them were marionettes operated by invisible strings that rose from the wands into the air.
Tents crumpled and fell as the wizards marched by.
